vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the Virtual Machine on the Hypervisor

target_server_type.title: Target Server Type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment into which the instance will be created

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface of a component or the BOF interface on VSC. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. This field can be overridden by defining the management network bridge separately in the component configuration. Defaults to the global setting

sdwan_portal_fqdn.title: SD-WAN Portal FQDN
sdwan_portal_fqdn.description: For Clustered SD-WAN Portal, the FQDN of the Docker cluster; For standalone Portal, the FQDN of the single Docker host

vsd_fqdn.title: VSD FQDN
vsd_fqdn.description: FQDN of the VSD or VSD cluster for this VSTAT

vstats_ip.title: Management IP address
vstats_ip.description: Management network IP address for the VSTAT

password_reset_email.title: Reset Email
password_reset_email.description: Sender Email address used for password resets.

new_account_email.title: New account Email
new_account_email.description: Sender Email address used for new accounts.

forgot_password_email.title: Forgot password sender Email
forgot_password_email.description: Sender Email address used for forgotten password.
